title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and Python/JavaScript libraries to run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other models locally with one command.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama server—chat, generate, embed, list, pull, push.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client exposing chat, generate, embed, list, pull, push, delete with synchronous & async APIs.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package offering Ollama LLM, embeddings, and tool-calling components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama supporting multi-model chats, code highlighting, RAG.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent API, streaming, embeddings, and custom timeout options.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Lightweight retrieval-augmented generation example using Ollama embeddings and Chroma vector store.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-like inline suggestions.

title: ollama-cli-chat
summary: Interactive CLI chat shell with conversation history, markdown rendering, and multi-line input.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app that proxies to Ollama, adds session memory, and exports conversations to markdown.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package providing typed JS/TS bindings to Ollama’s REST endpoints for chat, generate, embed.

title: ollama-py
summary: Official PyPI package exposing sync & async clients for chat, generate, embeddings, and model management.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration offering OllamaGenerator and OllamaEmbedder nodes for pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client library for Ollama with async streaming, chat, and embeddings support.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and PVC.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing typed async bindings to Ollama’s chat, generate, embed, and pull APIs.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that chats using local Ollama models with slash commands and thread support.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app integrating Ollama for chat completions with admin-configurable model selection.

title: ollama-go
summary: Community-maintained Go client for Ollama with context cancellation and streaming support.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot
summary: End-to-end RAG chatbot template using Ollama embeddings, LangChain, and FastAPI backend.
